title: Bought a champ and skin, not showing up in my champ pool
body: I just bought vi and her demon skin and she isn't in my champ pool to pick.  Tried restarting the game and it didn't work.  Still not available.

replies.body:
Hiya Righteous Rage,

If you're still having this issue, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look into your purchase history and make any corrections to your account.
That isn't what this board is for;  you want customer support.
